room_title: Escape room "Gumshoe Mystery" by Queen City Escape in Buffalo
review: Great Escape rooms! Have done the stranger things room all new best time for the room. Crushed the 90's room and stayed to bust the Gumshoe mystery room. Great times! Can't wait to go back for the others!

room_title: Escape room "Gumshoe Mystery" by Queen City Escape in Buffalo
review: We did the "Gumshoe Mystery" escape room as a double date and had so much fun. This was our first experience doing an escape room and will definitely do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Gumshoe Mystery" by Queen City Escape in Buffalo
review: My husband and I were traveling through Buffalo as part of our honeymoon and on a rainy afternoon we thought we'd try this escape room and I am so glad we did!Mark and I had an incredible time doing the 'Gumshoe' room - the room itself was so exciting to complete and the puzzles we had to solve were like none we have done before! I can't recommend this escape room highly enough! Dominic was so friendly and the whole experience was fantastic, thank you so much!
